alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 9:44PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Willow Creek near Watertown affecting Codington County. .The following river forecasts include forecast precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any additional future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Willow Creek near Watertown. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was unknown due to damage to the river gauge. Codington county emergency management confirms water to the base of the bridge along 458th Avenue. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 PM CDT Tuesday is unknown at this time. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Thursday.
